class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Frigid </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">sweet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">parting </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Face </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Frigid </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">fleet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e088ff">Feet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Alien </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">vain </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">whatever </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Clime </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Acrid </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">whatever </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Fate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Given </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">without </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">Suit </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0e464">Riches </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Name </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Realm </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">She </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">withold </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">from </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8ff92">Penury </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">Home? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Frigid and sweet her parting face
